name: mris_preproc
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Script to prepare surface-based data for high-level analysis by resampling surface or volume source data to a common subject and concatenating them into one file.

inputs.description: Save output here.
inputs.name: Output File

inputs.description: Subject to use as the common-space. All input data will be resampled to the surface of this subject.
inputs.name: Target Subject

inputs.description: Use hemisphere for source and target surfaces. Can be lh or rh.
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Use subject/surf/hemi.surfmeasure as input. Implies --srcfmt curv.
inputs.name: Surface Measure

inputs.description: Look in label/hemi.annotname.(annot,mgz) and use mapmethod nnf.
inputs.name: Label

inputs.description: Look in subdir instead of surf.
inputs.name: Measure Directory

inputs.description: Specify an input subject on the command-line. All subjects must be specified in this way.
inputs.name: Subjects

inputs.description: Specify the list of input subjects from the fsgd file.
inputs.name: FSGD File

inputs.description: List all subjects separated by white space in subjlistfile.
inputs.name: Subject List File

inputs.description: Specify list of subjects via qdec table file. Assumes the first column is the "fsid".
inputs.name: QDEC Table

inputs.description: Specify list of subjects via longitudinal qdec table file.
inputs.name: QDEC Longitudinal Table

inputs.description: Specify full path to input surface measure file.
inputs.name: Surface Measure File

inputs.description: Specify full path to a volume file and its registration matrix file.
inputs.name: Volume Measure and Registration Files

inputs.description: When sampling a volume onto the surface, sample a fraction of the thickness along the surface normal.
inputs.name: Projection Fraction

inputs.description: When sampling a volume onto the surface, find max along projection for vol2surf.
inputs.name: Projection Fraction Max

inputs.description: Compute average along projection for vol2surf.
inputs.name: Projection Fraction Average

inputs.description: Do not mask out non-cortex in vol2surf.
inputs.name: No Mask Non-Cortex Flag

inputs.description: FS-FAST session file.
inputs.name: Session File

inputs.description: FS-FAST session directory file.
inputs.name: Directory File

inputs.description: FS-FAST analysis.
inputs.name: Analysis

inputs.description: FS-FAST contrast.
inputs.name: Contrast

inputs.description: Use fsfast contrast variance (cesvar).
inputs.name: CVar Flag

inputs.description: Use fsfast mean offset (h-offset).
inputs.name: Offset Flag

inputs.description: Use fsfast contrast/map.
inputs.name: Map

inputs.description: Divide each subject's value by the Estimated Total Intra Cranial Volume as found in aseg.stats.
inputs.name: ETIV Flag

inputs.description: Smooth by fwhm mm on the target surface.
inputs.name: FWHM Smoothing

inputs.description: Smooth by fwhm mm on the source surface.
inputs.name: FWHM Source Smoothing

inputs.description: Smooth by niters on the target surface.
inputs.name: Number of Iterations Smoothing

inputs.description: Smooth by niters on the source surface.
inputs.name: Source Smoothing Iterations

inputs.description: Exclude medial wall.
inputs.name: Cortex Only Flag

inputs.description: Use mgz format internally.
inputs.name: MGZ Format Flag

inputs.description: Turn off jacobian correction.
inputs.name: No Jacobian Flag

inputs.description: Compute paired differences after concatenating all inputs together.
inputs.name: Paired Difference Flag

inputs.description: Cache the output in the specified cache file.
inputs.name: Cache Output

inputs.description: Use the pre-computed cached data from the specified cache file.
inputs.name: Cache Input

inputs.description: Cache data without actually creating an output.
inputs.name: Cache Output Only

inputs.description: Do not prune the inputs.
inputs.name: No Prune Flag

inputs.description: Compute the mean of all inputs.
inputs.name: Mean Flag

inputs.description: Compute the standard deviation of all inputs.
inputs.name: Standard Deviation Flag

inputs.description: Reshape spatial dimensions.
inputs.name: Reshape Flag

inputs.description: Use specified surface registration to the common space.
inputs.name: Surface Registration

inputs.description: Set SUBJECTS_DIR environment variable.
inputs.name: Subjects Directory

inputs.description: Synthesize the input data with white gaussian noise.
inputs.name: Synthesize Flag

inputs.description: Use specified temporary directory.
inputs.name: Temporary Directory

inputs.description: Do not delete temporary files.
inputs.name: No Cleanup Flag

inputs.description: Delete temporary files (default).
inputs.name: Cleanup Flag

inputs.description: Specify log file.
inputs.name: Log File

inputs.description: Do not create a log file.
inputs.name: No Log Flag

inputs.description: Enable debug mode.
inputs.name: Debug Flag
